demo¶

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<scenario>
    <step event="shuttle_pos" x="70" y="2" z="0" duration="0"/>
    <step event="shuttle_look_at" x="0" y="5" z="0" time="0" duration="0"/>
    <step event="wait">
            <end_conditions>
                <condition key="b_admin" value="True"/>
            </end_conditions>
    </step>
    <step event="control_screen_event" name="default_screen" duration="0"/>
    <step event="update_software_state" name="listen_to_hardware" value="False" duration="0"/>
    <step event="reset_leds" duration="0"/>
    <step event="boost" direction="f" power="20" duration="30"/>
    <step event="wait">
            <end_conditions>
                <condition key="b_admin" value="True"/>
            </end_conditions>
        </step>
    <step event="restart"/>
</scenario>

demo static¶

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<scenario>
    <step event="shuttle_pos" x="10" y="10" z="0" duration="0"/>
    <step event="shuttle_look_at" x="0" y="5" z="0" time="0" duration="0"/>

    <step event="control_screen_event" name="default_screen" duration="0"/>
    <step event="update_software_state" name="listen_to_hardware" value="False" duration="0"/>
    <step event="leds_init"/>
</scenario>

go to mars¶

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<scenario>
    <group name="debut de jeux">
        <step action="play_sound" name="ok" duration="0"/>
        <step action="set_screen" duration="0.0" name="go_to_mars"/>

        <!-- set chronometer and time limit -->
        <event action="goto_step" goto_id="wrong_end" delay="40"/>
        <step action="start-chrono" time="40" duration="0"/>

        <!-- wait 5 seconds -->
        <step action="wait" duration="5"/>

<!--        <step action="start_game"/>-->
<!--        <step action="play_sound" name="human_0" duration="20"/>-->

        <!-- identification -->
        <step action="info" title="$id_info_title$" text="$id_info_text$" duration="20"/>
        <step action="password" password="Aa" title="$id_title$" text="$id_text_0$" icon="locked"/>
        <step action="password" password="Bb" title="$id_title$" text="$id_text_1$" icon="locked"/>
        <step action="password" password="Cc" title="$id_title$" text="$id_text_2$" icon="locked"/>

        <!-- fermeture des portes -->
        <step action="wait" duration="2"/>
        <step action="play_sound" name="voice_door_close" volume="3.0" duration="1"/>
        <step action="play_sound" name="door_close" volume="3.0" duration="10"/>

        <!-- cible -->
        <step action="play_sound" name="human_target" duration="0"/>
        <!-- 180 = 3 MINUTES POUR LA BASE-->
        <step action="info" duration="20" title="$target_title_info$" text="$target_text_info$" icon="target"/>
        <step action="password" format="target" password="XX-XX-XX" title="$target_title$" icon="target" text="$target_text_1$" hint_sound="human_hint_target" hint_time="180"/>
        <step action="password" format="target" password="XX-XX-XX" title="$target_title$" icon="target" text="$target_text_2$" hint_sound="human_hint_target" hint_time="180"/>
        <step action="info" duration="4" title="$target_ok_title$" text="$target_ok_text$" icon="load_spinner"/>

         <!--mise ne route des moteurs-->
        <step action="reset_leds" duration="1"/>
        <step action="play_sound" name="engine_starts" duration="2" volume="2.0"/>
        <step action="play_sound" name="human_1" duration="2"/>
        <step action="shuttle_look_at" x="0" y ="10" z="0"/>
        <step action="shuttle_goto" x="-2" y="10" z="1" power="30"/>
        <step action="shuttle_look_at" x="0" y="0" z="0"/>

        <!-- premier mouvement -->
        <step action="play_sound" name="human_2" duration="5"/>
        <step action="asteroid" duration="0"/>
        <step action="wait" duration="2.2"/>
        <step action="play_sound" name="start_music" duration="0"/>
        <step action="shuttle_goto" x="500" y="10" z="0" power="200" duration="12.5"/>

         <!--collision -->
        <step action="collision_new" duration="2"/>
        <step action="play_sound" name="alarm" duration="0" loop="True"/>
        <step action="warning" duration="10" title="$title_collision_info$" text="$text_collision_info$"/>
        <step action="password" password="15Hu7" title="$title_collision_password$" text="$text_collision_password$"/>
        <step action="stop_sound" name="alarm"/>
    </group>
    <group name="partie joueur">
        <!-- fréquence urgence-->
        <step action="play_sound" name="voice_emergency_freq" duration="10"/>

        <step action="info" close_time="20" title="$title_procedure$" text="$text_procedure_pu2$">
            <condition key="freq_comm" value="310"/>
        </step>

        <!--<step action="oxygen" time="800" value="0" delay="0" duration="2"/>-->
<!--        <step action="oxygen_leak" duration="1"/>-->

        <step action="play_sound" name="bips" duration="0"/>
        <step action="led_on" id="l_antenne_com" duration="0"/>
        <!-- this time can be adapted -->
        <step action="play_sound" name="human_3" duration="7"/>
        <step action="play_sound" name="human_pu4" duration="18"/>

        <!-- PU4 -->
        <step action="info" close_time="20" title="$title_procedure$" text="$text_procedure_pu4$">
            <condition key="batteries" value="True"/>
            <condition key="batterie1" value="True"/>
            <condition key="batterie2" value="True"/>
            <condition key="batterie3" value="True"/>
            <condition key="batterie4" value="True"/>
        </step>
        <step action="wait" duration="3.0"/>
        <step action="play_sound" name="human_pu6"/>

        <!-- PU6 -->
        <step action="info" close_time="20" title="$title_procedure$" text="$text_procedure_pu6$">
            <condition key="thermique_secteur2" value="False"/>
            <condition key="thermique_secteur3" value="False"/>
            <condition key="oxygene_secteur2" value="False"/>
            <condition key="oxygene_secteur3" value="False"/>
            <condition key="tension_secteur2" value="False"/>
            <condition key="tension_secteur3" value="False"/>
            <condition key="recyclage_H2O" value="False"/>
            <condition key="recyclage_CO2" value="False"/>
            <condition key="recyclage_O2" value="False"/>
        </step>
        <step action="wait" duration="3.0"/>
        <step action="play_sound" name="human_pu7"/>


        <!-- PU7 -->
        <!-- 180 = 3 MINUTES POUR L"INDICE DES PANNEAUX-->
        <step action="info" close_time="20" title="$title_procedure$" text="$text_procedure_pu7$" hint_sound="human_hint_pu7" hint_time="180">
            <condition key="offset_ps_x" value="0.0"/>
            <condition key="offset_ps_y" value="0.0"/>
        </step>

         <!--PA1 -->
        <step action="play_sound" name="human_p_a_1" duration="9"/>
        <step action="info" close_time="20" title="$title_procedure$" text="$text_procedure_pa1$">
            <condition key="pilote_automatique1" value="True"/>
        </step>

        <!-- PA2 -->
        <step action="wait" duration="2.0"/>
        <step action="play_sound" name="human_p_a_2" duration="4"/>

        <step action="wait" duration="5.0"/>
        <step action="info" close_time="20" title="$title_procedure$" text="$text_procedure_pa2$">
            <condition key="pilote_automatique2" value="True"/>
        </step>
    </group>

    <group name="good end">
        <step action="wait" duration="2.0"/>
        <step action="play_sound" name="human_p_a_ok" duration="10"/>
        <step action="end_game"/>
        <step action="led_off" id="l_alert0"/>
        <step action="led_off" id="l_alert1"/>

        <!-- LAST MOVE -->
        <step action="play_sound" name="end_music" duration="0"/>
        <step action="shuttle_look_at" x="0" y="-10" z="0" time="10"/>
        <step action="control_screen_event" name="image_screen" image_name="end" duration="0"/>

        <step action="boost" direction="f" power="20" duration="0"/>
        <step action="wait" duration="10"/>
        <step action="control_screen_event" name="image_screen" image_name="score" duration="0"/>
        <step action="show_score"/>
        <step action="wait" duration="10"/>

        <step action="play_sound" name="human_end" duration="0"/>

        <!-- RESTART GAME -->
        <step action="wait">
            <end_conditions>
                <condition key="b_admin" value="True"/>
            </end_conditions>
        </step>
        <step action="restart"/>
    </group>

    <!--    This should not be reached until time end -->
    <group name="wrong end">
        <step action="info" id="wrong_end" title="end of game !!!" text="this should be the end of game ..."/>

        <!-- RESTART GAME -->
        <step action="wait">
            <end_conditions>
                <condition key="b_admin" value="True"/>
            </end_conditions>
        </step>
        <step action="restart"/>
    </group>
</scenario>

lost astronaut¶

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<scenario>
    <group name="debut de jeux">
<!--        <event action="goto_step" goto_id="end_game" delay="10"/>-->

        <step action="play_sound" name="ok" duration="0"/>
        <step action="set_screen" duration="0.0" name="new_scenario"/>

        <step action="password" password="Aa" title="$unlock_title$" text="$unlock_text$" background_color="(0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 1.0)"/>

        <step action="info" title="$reboot_title$" text="$reboot_text_0$" duration="5.0" close_on_enter="False" background_color="(0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 1.0)"/>
        <step action="info" title="$reboot_title$" text="$reboot_text_1$" duration="5.0" close_on_enter="False" background_color="(0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 1.0)"/>
        <step action="info" title="$reboot_title$" text="$reboot_text_2$" duration="5.0" close_on_enter="False" background_color="(0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 1.0)"/>

        <step action="wait" duration="2.0"/>
        <step action="terminal-show" text="$terminal_text_0$" title="$terminal_title$" focus="True" dt='0.1' duration="2.0"/>

<!--        <step action="wait" duration="2.0"/>-->
<!--        <step action="info" title="video_title_info" text="$video_text_info$" duration="2.0" close_on_enter="False" background_color="(0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.5)"/>-->
<!--        <step action="video" title="$video_title$" name="test_sound" start="True" size_x="2.0" size_y="1.5" duration="15.0" background_color="(0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.5)"/>-->
<!--        <step action="info" text="video gone ?"/>-->

        <!--        <step action="video" duration="2.0" name="test_sound" text=""/>-->

        <step action="wait"/>

        <step action="info" id="end_game" title="end of game !!!" text="this should be the end of game ..."/>
        <step action="start-chrono" time="20" duration="1.0"/>
        <step action="info" title="end of game II !!!" text="YESSS"/>

    </group>
</scenario>

scenario test¶

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<scenario>
    <group name="debut de jeux">
        <group name="end game">
            <event action="stop_game" delay="11.0"/>
            <event action="warning" title="last window" text="This should be seen !" delay="15.0"/>
<!--            <event action="end_game" delay="16.0"/>-->
        </group>

        <step action="set_screen" duration="0.0" name="shuttle_state"/>
        <step action="wait" duration="3.0"/>
        <step action="info" title="test window" text="this shall be closed in 8 secs." duration="20"/>
        <step action="info" title="test window" text="Do you see mee ?" duration="20"/>

        <step action="play_sound" name="end_music" duration="0"/>
    </group>
</scenario>

test¶

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<scenario>
    <group name="debut de jeux">
        <step action="set_screen" duration="0.0" name="shuttle_state"/>

        <step action="info" title="" text="\1golden\1Thank you to play_sfx with us !\2" duration="20" icon="None" size_x="2.0" size_y="1.5"/>
        <step action="end_game" duration="20" save_score="False"/>
        <step action="wait" duration="5"/>
    </group>
</scenario>
